item.title: Optimizing tests in Spring Boot applications
item.description: It is extremely common for applications built with Spring Boot to have all their tests annotated with @SpringBootTest, but it is rare to find people who know the functionality of this annotation, when it is necessary to use it and its impact on the execution of an application’s tests. You probably thought that this annotation is for building tests, but do you know what it represents, what happens when it is used?
